snippet: A woman struck in the head when Oakland’s Brett Lawrie broke his bat on a groundout was carried away on a stretcher after the top of the second inning.
abstract: Woman is hospitalized with life-threatening injuries after being struck in head with broken bat during Boston Red Sox game.
lead_paragraph: A woman struck in the head when Oakland’s Brett Lawrie broke his bat on a groundout was carried away on a stretcher after the top of the second inning.

headline.main: Life in Jeopardy as Broken Bat Hits Boston Fan
headline.print_headline: Fan in Boston Badly Hurt by Bat
